description.en: A rare perfume handed down through Lillip's family.
description.ar: A rare perfume handed down through Lillip's family.
description.br: Um perfume raro manipulado pela família de Lillip.
description.cns: 相传为莉莉普栽种而成的花朵，所制作成的香水
description.de: (Jobquestitem) Das Parfüm wurde aus einer Liriff, einer seltenen Blume, hergestellt. Sie wurde in der Lillip Familie von Generation zu Generation weitergereicht.
description.fi: A rare perfume handed down through Lillip's family.
description.fil: A rare perfume handed down through Lillip's family.
description.fr: parfum créé à partir d'essence de Liriff, fleur très rare qui se transmet dans la famille de Lillip.
description.id: Parfum langka yang diturunkan melalui keluarga Lilip.
description.it: A rare perfume handed down through Lillip's family.
description.jp: リルリップの一族に代々伝わり、700年に一度咲くというエンシェントロータスから作られた香水。古代マドリガル王は千金を積んでこの香水を求めたという。
description.kr: 릴립의 가문 대대로 전해져 내려오는 희귀한 꽃인 리리프를 사용하여 만든 향수.
description.nl: A rare perfume handed down through Lillip's family.
description.pl: A rare perfume handed down through Lillip's family.
description.ru: Необычные благовония, секрет которых передавался из поколения в поколение.
description.sp: Un raro perfume transmitido a través de la familia de Lillip.
description.sw: A rare perfume handed down through Lillip's family.
description.th: น้ำหอมหายากที่สืบทอดมาจากครอบครัวของ Lillip
description.tw: 相傳為黎利栽種而成的花朵，所製作成的香水
description.vi: Một loại nước hoa quý hiếm được lưu truyền qua gia đình Lillip.
